name: Ubity
overview:
UB-VoIP is a fully hosted system, requiring no equipment or maintenance, that offers a variety of functions unavailable to typical telecom providers.

Ubity offers VoIP line services, SIP or IAX, directly to the location of your choice. We can deliver local call from one of our city or country on your VoIP server or simply route it to traditional lines. Ubity offers service in the following and countries:

  • Montreal - Toronto - Vancouver - Calgary - Edmonton
  • Quebec - Ottawa - Victoria - Mississauga
  • North and South Shore of Montreal
  • United States of America (1 847 cities)
  • France - United ingdom - Spain - Germany
  • And many more ..
